Description:
You reached the grass hill behind the tower, as the farmer told you there is a group of sheep grazing and among them you see a larger sheep with golden wool.

That must be the legendary golden sheep! you don't know if it's rare enough to call it legendary ... but one thing's for sure, that sheep's wool looks like it will be really expensive.

If you want to catch and kill it you will only have one chance before all the sheep run away.
DescriptionAction: How do you want approach them?
